objects.name: WinningText
objects.string: Congratulations! You have arrested the murderer!

content.text: Congratulations! You have arrested the murderer!

objects.name: LosingScreenText
objects.string:
You are wrong! The Murderer is...

Benjamin B Beans!

content.text:
You are wrong! The Murderer is...

Benjamin B Beans!

objects.name: DialogueControlText
objects.string:
Space = Next Line
Up + Down = Select Reply
E = Confirm Reply

content.text:
Space = Next Line
Up + Down = Select Reply
E = Confirm Reply

parameters: "This is the will of the victim. The finance is the only person mentioned on the will, all properties and possessions will go to her."
"This mop has been tossed aside.. And there's blood on it!? This must have been used to clean up the crime scene!"
"Why is there a can of beans on the floor?"
"This must be the murderer's footprints.. They stepped in ice cream. It's a size 9 footprint."
"There has been a murder! The CEO of PriceCo has been stabbed by a foreign object and placed in the freezer."
"What's an expensive bracelet doing near the crime scene?"

events.comment: e to talk to npc. space to show next line of dialogue. up and down arrow to hover over a reply. e to select reply. dialogue disappears 2 seconds after last line is displayed.
